title: Migrate SkiaSharp documentation from Xamarin.Forms to .NET MAUI
body:
## Summary
This PR migrates all SkiaSharp documentation from Xamarin.Forms to .NET MAUI.

## Changes Made

### Documentation Updates (54 files)
- Updated `ms.service` from `xamarin` to `dotnet-maui`
- Changed C# namespaces: `SkiaSharp.Views.Forms` → `SkiaSharp.Views.Maui.Controls`
- Updated XAML namespaces from Xamarin schema to Microsoft .NET MAUI schema
- Updated Color API: `Color.X` → `Colors.X` (MAUI uses `Colors` class)
- Replaced all "Xamarin.Forms" text references with ".NET MAUI"
- Updated cross-references (xref) to use `Microsoft.Maui.Controls` namespace

### Sample Links
- Replaced ~105 external GitHub links to `xamarin-forms-samples` with local relative paths to the `samples/` folder

### Cleanup
- Removed outdated book references ("Creating Mobile Apps with Xamarin.Forms")
- Updated contributing guidelines

### New Files
- Added `.github/copilot-instructions.md` documenting the migration patterns for future reference

## Testing
- [ ] DocFX build passes (workflow triggered on PR)
- [ ] No broken internal links
- [ ] All sample code paths resolve correctly
